title: Fishing Planet: Live Bait Fiesta Pack

longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Live Bait Fiesta Pack
<!--text-->
Are you ready to show your high-level fishing technique in the live bait tournament? Focus on improving your fishing skill, and the Live Bait Fiesta Pack will cover all your equipment needs! This set contains everything you need for both match and bottom fishing: heavy-duty rods with equally powerful reels, the necessary set of tackle, and suitable live fish baits. The set also includes a capacious keepnet for storing a large number of caught fish for a long time. Now you are ready. Get the Live Bait Fiesta Pack and enjoy the tournament!

Live Bait Fiesta Pack includes:
* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 50 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* UL-CHUBER™ LBFC DeepDiver 10' 2" (310) - Length: 10' 2" (3.1 m); Casting Weight: 6 – 9 1/2 Oz (170–270 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 35–70.5 Lb (16–32 kg); Action: Moderate; Pieces: 2; Guides: 12+1
* RIVERTEX™ LBFC AquaBreeze™ XL 14' 9" (450) - Length: 14' 10" (4.5 m); Line Weight: 22–45 Lb (10–20.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 3; Guides: 15

Reels:
* UL-CHUBER™ LBFC Jetstream 11000 - Ratio: 4.3; Recovery: 45" (115 cm); Capacity: Mono 73/123 (0.8/123), Braid  44/343 (0.32/343); Max Drag: 70.5 Lb (32 kg); Drag: Front
* RIVERTEX™ LBFC StreamRunnerPro 5500 - Ratio: 5.4; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/110 (0.5/110), Braid 30/180 (0.28/180); Max Drag: 42 Lb (19 kg); Drag: Front

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m):
Fluoro .032" (0.8 mm) - Test: 70.5 Lb (32 kg)
Braid .012" (0.3 mm) - Test: 41.2 Lb (18.7 kg)

* Fluorocarbon Leader .030" (0.8) (x10) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 70.5 Lb (32 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .030" (0.8) (x10) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 70.5 Lb (32 kg)
* Titanium Leader .012" (0.3) (x10) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 41 Lb (18.6 kg)
* Titanium Leader .012" (0.3) (x10) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 41 Lb (18.6 kg)

* Sinkers: Sinker 5 1/2 Oz. (150 g), Sinker 6 Oz. (175 g), Sinker 7 Oz. (200 g), Sinker 8 Oz. (225 g)
* Bobbers: Ball Bobber, Pear Shaped Float, Waggler Х Heavy
* Simple Bell (x3)
* Hooks: Hook #3/0 (x10), Hook #4/0 (x10), Hook #5/0 (x10), Hook #6/0 (x10), Hook #7/0 (x10), Hook #8/0 (x10), Hook #9/0 (x10), Hook #10/0 (x10)
* Baits: Small Minnows (x50), Large Minnows (x50), Shiners (x50), Finger Mullets (x50), Scaled Sardine (x50), Aracu Minnow (x50), Amazonian Sardine (x50), Small Tilapia (x50), Common Minnow (x50), Banded Aracu Minnow (x50)

EQUIPMENT
* Garry Scott™ FishCastle L Plus Keepnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 165 Lb (75 kg); Total Fish Weight: 440 Lb (200 kg); Fish-Friendly: Yes
* RIVERTEX™ LBFC Rod Protector Deluxe - Rods: 2; Reels: 4; Lines: 2
* RIVERTEX™ LBFC Fiesta Box - Tackles: 50; Lines: 2; Reels: 1
* RIVERTEX™ LBFC River Master Jacket - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Peru License
Advanced Bolivia License
Advanced Brazil License
